# init(currentSuggestion:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new query context object with an optional suggested search string.

## Declaration

```swift
init(currentSuggestion: CSSuggestion?)
```

## Parameters

- **currentSuggestion**: The suggested text completion that the person selected in your interface. Specify `nil` if the person hasnâ€™t chosen a suggestion.

## Return Value

An initialized user query context object. Configure the properties of the returned object and use it to construct a [doc://com.apple.corespotlight/documentation/CoreSpotlight/CSUserQuery] object.
